name: Father Gascoigne
description: A hunter turned mad by the blood, wielding an axe and a blunderbuss, who transforms into a beast mid-fight.

name: Lady Maria of the Astral Clocktower
description: A tragic hunter and former student of Gehrman, wielding dual blades and harnessing the power of blood and fire.

name: Ludwig, Holy Blade
description: A former holy knight who transformed into a horrific beast, only to remember his past glory in the second phase.

name: Orphan of Kos
description: The tragic child of the Great One Kos, wielding the remains of its mother as a weapon in a furious, unpredictable battle.

name: Ebrietas, Daughter of the Cosmos
description: A kin of the Great Ones, Ebrietas is a massive, otherworldly creature who can channel arcane magic.

name: Martyr Logarius
description: A fanatical and powerful hunter of the Vilebloods, now a ghostly king who guards the entrance to their throne room.

name: The One Reborn
description: A grotesque amalgamation of corpses birthed from the nightmare, wielding dark magic and immense power.

name: Gehrman, The First Hunter
description: The first hunter and caretaker of the Hunter's Dream, who wields a scythe with deadly precision.

name: Amygdala
description: A Great One with multiple limbs, attacking with a combination of physical might and arcane power.

name: Mergo's Wet Nurse
description: A towering, spectral entity who guards the infant Great One, Mergo, wielding multiple blades with swift, lethal precision.

name: Vicar Amelia
description: A towering beast with a healing factor, formerly the Vicar of the Healing Church, now corrupted by the blood.

name: Blood-starved Beast
description: A hideously emaciated creature, driven mad by thirst for blood, spreading poison with its attacks.
